name: Piano Dream
description:
- It was an incredible piano music game in a different way.
- Every note is respond to your tap!
Do you imagine that you can play wonderful music, "Piano Dream" can finish your dreams, through it, beautiful rhythm and melody could be flowing in your hands, giving you a wonderful music journey.

The game provides two modes of playing - double thumb and four fingers, and can open real-time sound feedback function, providing a real musical playing feeling. The game's music selects works of many great composers, and more tracks will be updated in the future.

There are 28 beautiful free songs in the game. Don't you try?

FEATURES:
Can turn on and off real-time feedback of sound.
Optimized for double-thumb and four-fingerplay.
Provides sound-delay calibration to ensure strict synchronization of the picture and music.
Provides additional paid music packages.

https://icanflygame.wixsite.com/games
icanflygame@gmail.com
